actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title III of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 and chapter 141 of title 10, United States Code, to require Federal Government contractors to employ local residents in areas of high unemployment.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 and the miscellaneous procurement provisions of military law to require Government contractors to employ local State residents in high unemployment areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend title III of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 and chapter 141 of title 10, United States Code, to require Federal Government contractors to employ local residents in areas of high unemployment.
